title: The Phantom Menace
quote: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)
content: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

title: ROGUE ONE: A STAR WARS STORY
quote: ROGUE ONE: A STAR WARS STORY
content: From Lucasfilm comes the first of the Star Wars standalone films, “Rogue One: A Star Wars Story,” an who may bring balance to the Force all-tar Wars timeline brings together ordinary

title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
quote: STAR WARS: EPISODE II ATTACK OF THE CLONES
content: Padawan Anakin Skywalker must choose between his Jedi duty and forbidden love, while Obi-Wan Kenobi uncovers a sinister plot that leads to war.

title: STAR WARS: EPISODE III REVENGE OF THE SITH
quote: STAR WARS: EPISODE III REVENGE OF THE SITH
content: Faced with haunting premonitions that his secret wife, Padmé Amidala, will die, Anakin Skywalker is seduced by the dark side.

title: STAR WARS: EPISODE V THE EMPIRE STRIKES BACK
quote: STAR WARS: EPISODE V THE EMPIRE STRIKES BACK
content: After the destruction of the Death Star, the Empire has regrouped -- with Darth Vader leading the hunt for Luke Skywalker.
